org.deeplearning4j.plot

Class BarnesHutTsne

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.plot.Tsne
      • org.deeplearning4j.plot.BarnesHutTsne
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Model

    public class BarnesHutTsne
extends Tsne
implements Model
    Barnes hut algorithm for TSNE, uses a dual tree approximation approach. Work based on: http://lvdmaaten.github.io/tsne/
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
